name: Targis
overview: Targis is an platform game with a look and feel reminiscent of Lode Runner, developed and published by Incognito, which was released in 1988. Brave the Proter's lair and retrieve all of the stolen rocket parts or have the terror of the Proters haunt the rest of the galaxy forever! 200 different levels of lair, full level editor create infinitely many levels. Player can modify all graphics, sound and animations to make Targis a totally difficult game every time. Incredibly addictive and endless hours of family enjoyment.
